level_1.skillDescription: Generates a healing field at the designated spot

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the skill's effective area and HP recovery amount

level_3.skillDescription:

Charging to higher stages increases the skill's effective area and HP recovery amount

abilities.skillDescription: Reduces the skill's effective area but increases HP recovery
